name: vacuum-wave
short_effect: Inflicts regular damage with no additional effect.

flavor_text.diamond-pearl: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.
flavor_text.platinum: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.
flavor_text.heartgold-soulsilver: The user whirls its fists to send a wave of pure vacuum at the foe. This move always goes first.
